Trade/Device Name(s): illumigene® Group B Streptococcus (GBS) DNA Amplification Assay
illumigene Group B Streptococcus (GBS) DNA Amplification Assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): illumipro-10 Automated Isothermal Amplification and Detection System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for illumigene Group B Streptococcus (GBS) DNA Amplification Assay using isothermal DNA amplification for qualitative detection of Streptococcus agalactiae in enriched vaginal/rectal swab cultures.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of Streptococcus agalactiae from enriched vaginal/rectal swab specimens collected from antepartum women, to aid in establishing GBS colonization status; not for diagnosis, treatment monitoring, or point-of-care use.
